name: Server Mirroring
description:
"One day a girl decided to travel into the Cyberspace, what's gonna happen?"

Coding: Gianluca Viscardi - ID: Klinker

Art & Music: Elio Ubaldi - ID: Heriumu

Hi guys! This is our first game ever, everything is original and made by ourselves, let us know what you think in the comments!


Controls:

-A/D for movement;

-SPACE for jumping;

-F to interact;

-M to mute the game;

-ESC to exit game.
